''(Win 10)'' |eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 10GbE |eth_conn = SFP+ |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = 10GbE (10GBase-LR/SR) |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 01/07/2019 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B072N84DG6 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = none |connactled = red (activity) |spdledcolor = green (10G), yellow (5G) |leddupcolor = none |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Interface: 1x SFP+ 10G port, 1x PCIe 3.0 x4 (single-line) *Data Connection Rate: 100Mbps/1Gbps/10Gbps *Standard Compliance: 802.3ae/802.1p/802.1q :802.3ae 10GBase-LR/SR, 802.1q VLAN Tagging :802.1p Priority Queuing (QoS) *LED Indicator: Speed LED / Link/Act LED :Speed LED: Dual color, Link/Act LED: Single color (Flashing) ==Links of Interest== ===Drivers=== *[https://github.com/acooks/tn40xx-driver/ Tehuti Networks TN40xx Driver (GitHub)] *[https://drp.su/en/devices/lan/1d6a/asus-xg-c100c-10gbe-copper-ethernet-adapter-ndis-6-50-miniport ''Windows Driver (NDIS 6.50 Miniport'')] - [[ASUS XG-C100C]] (1d6a:d107) *[[Tehuti]] Networks Ltd. • [https://admin.pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/1fc9 PCI ID: 1fc9] 
1fc9:4022			TN9310 10GbE SFP+ Ethernet Adapter

==See also== *[[ASUS ROG Areion 10G]] - ''10GBase-T PCIe LAN Card'' ([[Aquantia]] AQC107) • [https://rog.asus.com/articles/networking/bring-10gbit-ethernet-home/ PR] *[[ASUS XG-C100C]] - ''10GBase-T PCIe Network Adapter'' ([[Aquantia]] AQC107) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/XG-C100C/ PPage] *[[ASUS XG-C100F]] - ''10G SFP+ PCIe 3.0 4x Network Adapter'' (SFP+/DAC) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/XG-C100F/ PPage] *[[ASUS XG-U2008]] - ''10GBase-T Network 10-Port Unmanaged Switch'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/XG-U2008 PPage] *[[ASUS PEB-10G]] (57840-2S) - ''10G SFP+ PCIe Network Adapter'' (BCM57840S) • [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIA98C8K92999 NE] *[[ASUS PCE-AC68]] - ''AC1900 Dual Band WiFi PCIe Adapter'' (3x3, BCM4360) • [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIA25V6K14597 NE] *[[ASUS PCE-AC58BT]] - ''AC2100 Dual Band 160MHz WiFi PCIe Adapter'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/PCE-AC58BT/ PPage] *[[ASUS PCE-AC56]] - ''AC1300 Dual Band WiFi PCIe Adapter'' (2x2, BCM4352)• [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIAGUK7X95520 NE] *[[ASUS PCE-AC55BT B1]] - ''AC1200 Dual Band WiFi/BT4.2 PCIe Adapter'' • [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIA1K664V3936 NE] *[[Gigabyte GC-AQC107]] - 5/10GbE PCI-Express LAN Card ([[Aquantia]] AQC107) • [http://www.anandtech.com/show/11024/gigabyte-exhibits-an-aquantia-aqc107-based-10g-ethernet-pcie-card PR] *[[Gigabyte GC-AQC108]] - 2.5/5GbE PCI-Express LAN Card ([[Aquantia]] AQC108) *[[D-Link DXE-810S]] • 10GbE SFP+ Ethernet Adapter *[[Edimax EN-8102PF]] • 10 Gigabit Ethernet SFP+ PCI Express Adapter [[Category:English Documentation]]
